about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Building Your Vision, Crafting Your Future
about.description: At Black Pearls Contracting, we take pride in delivering fully integrated construction solutions that begin with strong civil foundations and extend seamlessly into advanced MEP systems. From structural works, finishing, and infrastructure development to electrical, HVAC, plumbing, and safety systems — every element is designed and executed as part of a single, coordinated process.
about.description2: Our multidisciplinary team of engineers, designers and technicians ensures smooth project delivery from concept to completion, whether it's for residential complexes, commercial spaces, or government facilities. By combining structural integrity with smart building services, we create environments that are not only durable and functional but also efficient, safe, and future-ready.

ceo.subtitle: Meet Our Leader
ceo.title: Our Leadership
ceo.description: Under visionary leadership, Black Pearls Contracting has grown to become Saudi Arabia's premier MEP contractor, delivering exceptional construction solutions across the kingdom.
ceo.name: Muhammad Abdullah Al Zughaibi
ceo.bio: With over 15 years of experience in construction and engineering, Muhammad Abdullah Al Zughaibi leads Black Pearls Contracting with a vision of excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth. His leadership has been instrumental in establishing the company as a trusted partner for major projects across Saudi Arabia.

faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our MEP services

mepServices.question: What MEP services do you provide?
mepServices.answer: We provide comprehensive MEP services including HVAC systems, electrical installations, fire safety systems, plumbing solutions, surveillance & security systems, and maintenance contracts. Our integrated approach ensures seamless coordination between all systems.

projectTypes.question: Do you work on both residential and commercial projects?
projectTypes.answer: Yes, we handle projects across all sectors including residential complexes, commercial buildings, government facilities, and industrial projects. Our team has experience with projects ranging from single-family homes to large-scale developments.

certifications.question: What certifications and standards do you follow?
certifications.answer: We comply with NFPA, SASO, and Saudi building codes. Our team consists of certified engineers and technicians who maintain international standards in all our projects.

projectTimeline.question: How long does a typical MEP project take?
projectTimeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A typical residential project takes 3-6 months, while commercial projects can range from 6-18 months. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase and maintain strict adherence to schedules.

maintenanceServices.question: Do you provide maintenance services after project completion?
maintenanceServices.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance contracts to ensure optimal performance of all MEP systems. Our 24/7 support team provides preventive maintenance, emergency repairs, and system optimization services.

deliveryProcess.question: What is your project delivery process?
deliveryProcess.answer: Our process includes initial consultation, detailed planning and design, procurement, installation, testing and commissioning, and final handover with complete documentation. We maintain transparent communication throughout the project lifecycle.

designServices.question: Do you offer design and engineering services?
designServices.answer: Yes, our in-house engineering team provides complete design and engineering services. We create detailed MEP drawings, specifications, and 3D models to ensure accurate implementation and coordination with other trades.

differentiation.question: What makes Black Pearls different from other MEP contractors?
differentiation.answer: Our integrated approach, certified expertise, 24/7 support, and commitment to quality set us apart. We combine structural integrity with smart building services, ensuring cohesive, compliant, and future-ready solutions for every project.
